name: meemz
description: A quick and easy to use meme browsing client

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=false --platform=win32 --arch=all --icon=images/icon.ico --prune=false --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="DeeBo - overflo.me" --version-string.FileDescription="A cross-platform Electron based Reddit Meme viewer." --version-string.ProductName="Meemz" --app-copyright "Copyright (C) 2018 DeeBo"

author: DeeBo
